item.title: [INTC] USA Rare Earth Deal Adds to Trump Administration's Portfolio
item.description: The Trump administration plans to take a stake in a rare-earth metal company as part of a proposed $1.6 billion funding deal. USA Rare Earth has a mining project in Texas and plans to manufacture rare-earth magnets‚Äîneeded for drones, wind turbines and other technology‚Äîin Oklahoma. The deal is the administration‚Äôs latest move to bolster the position of the U.S. in critical industries.

item.title: [AAPL] Retail Investors Dump Apple Stock While Nvidia, Tesla See Massive Inflows
item.description: Retail investors have been divesting Apple Inc. (NASDAQ:AAPL) shares while flocking to Nvidia Corp. (NASDAQ:NVDA) and Tesla Inc. (NASDAQ:TSLA) stocks. Retail investors have bought $15 billion of Nvidia stock since July 2025, outpacing all other Magnificent 7 companies combined, according to The Kobeissi Letter, which cited data from J.P. Morgan Equity Strategy & Quantitative Research. Tesla followed with $6 billion in net retail purchases. Retail investors are dumping Apple stock while piling in

item.title: [AAPL] Is Tesla Stock a Good Bet? How to Use Magnificent 7 Earnings Volatility to Your Advantage.
item.description: Investors can look at options markets to see what traders expect from stocks after earnings reports. The most aggressive investors can even take bets on what the market thinks about post-earnings volatility. Having an options straddle position means simultaneously buying a call option, which gives the holder the right to buy shares of a company at a fixed price at a date in the future, and a put option, which gives the holder the right to sell shares at a date in the future.

item.title: [LLOY.L] UK bank fined for breaking Russia sanctions
item.description: Bank of Scotland (BoS) has been fined by a regulator for breaking sanctions related to Russia's war in Ukraine. The Office of Financial Sanctions Implementation (OFSI) said ‚Äåa penalty of ¬£160,000 had been imposed over financial transactions dating back to 2023. OFSI, which oversees compliance with all sanctions levied against Russia on behalf of the UK government, said it had concluded that the ‚Äãbank breached prohibitions on dealing with, and making funds available to, a sanctioned person.

item.title: [INTC] Trump Admin To Acquire Stake In USA Rare Earth For $1.6 Billion: Report
item.description: The Trump administration is planning to invest $1.6 billion in USA Rare Earth Inc. (NASDAQ:USAR), marking its biggest investment in the sector. Securing Essential Mineral Supplies The U.S. government will acquire a 10% stake in the Oklahoma-based miner, which holds substantial U.S. deposits of heavy rare earths. This move is part of Washington‚Äôs strategy to secure essential mineral supplies, as reported by the Financial Times on Friday. The investment, along with a $1 billion private financing d

item.title: [INTC] These Stocks Are Today‚Äôs Movers: USA Rare Earth, Micron, Intel, AMD, Newmont, RevMed, and More
item.description: Stock futures were falling Monday after President Donald Trump threatened to impose further tariffs on Canada, fueling fears that the ‚Äúsell America‚Äù trade could gather pace, and as the chances of a partial U.S. government shutdown appeared more likely. USA Rare Earth surged 37% to $33.90 ahead of the opening bell. The Trump administration is planning to inject $1.6 billion into the miner and will receive a 10% stake, the Financial Times reported on Saturday, citing people familiar with the matter.
